name: Vrinda Normand
what_you_do: eWomenNetwork provides a platform for women entrepreneurs to connect, collaborate, and grow their businesses through various programs and resources.
who_you_serve: The organization serves women entrepreneurs and business owners, focusing on B2B and B2C audiences.
signature_programs: eWNCourses, eWomen Podcast Network, eWomen Speakers Network
bio: Notable collaborations with various women-focused initiatives and a strong online presence.
business_focus: eWomenNetwork provides a platform for women entrepreneurs to connect, collaborate, and grow their businesses through various programs and resources. (women entrepreneurship)
